Package system

Class GameModel

java.lang.Object
system.GameModel
public class GameModel extends Object
Contains logic and objects/collectinos needed to process game logic.
Since:
23

      Flag indicating whether a card redirection effect is active. Typically used when a card changes who draws or plays next.

  • Method Details

    • initSingleplayerGame

      public void initSingleplayerGame(String playerName)
      Initializes the game state. Resets all flags/clears all winners/creates AI players, adds players to the game.
      Parameters:
      playerName - - The name of the one human player playing.
      Since:
      23

    • initMultiplayerGame

      public void initMultiplayerGame(Vector<Player> players)
      Initializes a multiplayer game.
      Parameters:
      players - the list of players

    • resetGameFlags

      public void resetGameFlags()
      Clears the game status. Calls cleanUpGameState(), resets the turn order, resets game/round winners. This is called at the end of the game to simulate the game state as it was when it began.
      Since:
      23

    • instantiateDeck

      public void instantiateDeck()
      Clears the deck if it exists, else creates a new deck of 52 cards of each rank and suit.
      Since:
      23

    • shuffleDeck

      public void shuffleDeck()
      Shuffles the deck using the method from Collections.
      Since:
      23

    • dealCards

      public void dealCards(int numCards)
      Deals numCards players to each player in the list of players.
      Parameters:
      numCards - - the number of cards to deal to each player
      Since:
      23

    • createCPUOpponent

      public AIPlayer createCPUOpponent(int orientation)
      Creates a CPU opponent by getting a unique name from the list of AI names.
      Parameters:
      orientation - - Which orientation the AI player belongs to
      Returns:
      AIPlayer - the completed AIPlayer.
      Since:
      23

    • loadAINames

      public void loadAINames()
      Loads the list of names from the .txt into a local list
      Since:
      23

    • getAIPlayerName

      public String getAIPlayerName()
      Retrieves a unique name for an AI player from the list of names loaded by loadAIName
      Returns:
      String - The name returned.
      Since:
      23

    • initRound

      public void initRound()
      Initializes a new round. Resets the turn to start from the human player, clears each player's hand/the library/the played cards. Instantiates a new deck, shuffles it, deals cards to players, and flips the last card from the library into the played cards zone. Sets the configures the starting turn.
      Since:
      23

    • reshuffleSpentDeck

      public void reshuffleSpentDeck()
      Conserves the last played card and reshuffles all other cards from the library and played cards into a new library so that players don't try to draw from an empty deck.
      Since:
      23

    • playCard

      public boolean playCard(Card card)
      Attempts to play a card onto the last card of the played cards zone. Only succeeds if the "play" is legal.
      Parameters:
      card - - The card to play.
      Returns:
      boolean - Is the play successful or not.
      Since:
      23

    • isPlayLegal

      public boolean isPlayLegal(Card card)
      Checks if a play is legal. A play is legal if the rank or suit of the card to be played matches the rank or suit of the last played card, or if the card to be played is an eight.
      Parameters:
      card - - The card to be played
      Returns:
      boolean - Determines if the play was legal or not
      Since:
      23

    • isPlayLegal

      public boolean isPlayLegal(Card card, Card lastPlayedCard)
      Determines if a play is legal based on the card being passed to the method and the last played card in the discard pile.
      Parameters:
      card - the card to play
      lastPlayedCard - the last played card
      Returns:
      true if play is legal, false if not
      Since:
      23

    • drawCard

      public void drawCard()
      Draws a card to the hand of the current active user. If the library is empty, the deck is reshuffled first. Checks that the draw would not cause the player to have more than 12 (max) cards in hand first.
      Since:
      23

    • forceDraw

      public void forceDraw(Player passivePlayer, int penaltyCards)
      Forces a player to draw x cards. This happens if a two or four is played. The passive player is the player being forced to draw cards, and the active player is the player who's turn it is. Checks that the passive player has enough room in their hand to receive the cards, and if not, the cards are redirected to the active player. If that player also has a full hand, then the cards are not drawn and are instead turned into penalty points for the active player.
      Parameters:
      passivePlayer - - The player being forced to draw cards.
      penaltyCards - - The amount of cards that the method is forcing upon the player.
      Since:
      23

    • applySpecialAction

      public void applySpecialAction(Card c)
      Applies special actions that certain cards have, as stated in the rules. Each card that does not have a special action in the rules has the default special action of not being a two and resets the count of twos played.
      Parameters:
      c - - The card to check for special actions.
      Since:
      23

    • playAce

      public void playAce()
      Aces reverse the turn order. Default is clockwise vs. counterclockwise.
      Since:
      23

    • playTwo

      public void playTwo()
      Twos force the next player in the turn order to draw two times the number of twos played consecutively cards.
      Since:
      23

    • playFour

      public void playFour()
      Fours force the next player in the turn order to draw four cards.
      Since:
      23

    • playEight

      public void playEight()
      Eights allow the player to choose a new suit for the played eight. AI players choose a suit at random.
      Since:
      23

    • playQueen

      public void playQueen()
      Queens skip the turn of the next player.
      Since:
      23

    • isRoundOver

      public boolean isRoundOver()
      Checks if the current round is over; the round is over when any one player has no cards in hand. If a player plays their last card, they are the winner of the round.
      Returns:
      boolean - True if the round is over, false if not.
      Since:
      23

    • tallyScores

      public void tallyScores()
      Tallies up the scores for all players. The "score" is equal to the number of cards remaining in players hands when the round ends.
      Since:
      23

    • isGameOver

      public boolean isGameOver()
      Checks if the game is over. The game is over if any one player has reached or exceeded the max score as outlined in the constants (default 50). If the game is over, endGame() is called.
      Returns:
      boolean - True if the game is over, false if not.
      Since:
      23

    • getWinningPlayers

      public Vector<Player> getWinningPlayers()
      Determine who the winning player is. At the end of the game, the winning player is the one with the least points. If there are multiple players with
      Returns:
      Player - The winning players. If only one, the list will only have one element.
      Since:
      23

    • getNextPlayer

      public Player getNextPlayer()
      Retrieves the next player based on the current turn and the turn order and advances the turn by one in a direction based on if the turn order is reversed or not.
      Returns:
      Player - The next player in the turn order.
      Since:
      23

    • peekNextPlayer

      public Player peekNextPlayer()
      Looks at the next player without changing the turn order.
      Returns:
      the next player in the turn order
      Since:
      23

    • skipTurn

      public void skipTurn()
      Skips the next player's turn. Increments/decrements the current turn, based on if the turn order is reversed or not.
      Since:
      23

    • endGame

      public void endGame()
      Ends the current game. Retrieves the winning player, sets isGameRunning to false, and cleans up the game state.
      Since:
      23

    • cleanUpGameState

      public void cleanUpGameState()
      Clears the collections for played cards, library, and each player's hand.
      Since:
      23

    • incrementScore

      public void incrementScore(Player player, int amt)
      Increments a players score by a passed amount.
      Parameters:
      player - - The player who's score to increment.
      amt - - The amount to increment the score by.
      Since:
      23

    • setTurnOrderReversed

      public void setTurnOrderReversed(boolean turnOrder)
      Sets the turn order to either normal or reversed.
      Parameters:
      turnOrder - - True is reversed/counterclockwise, false is normal or clockwise.
      Since:
